description: Just in front of the entrance to a Metro station, I´ve met a cute young student of Law. As every student, he needed money. To live, to enjoy, to pay the rent, to be able to afford a girlfriend. I strike him with a nice offer. I could see that he is after the money, only thing he was afraid of was the public. No problem, I´ll pay the hotel. Once we got there, my cock was already on fire, I wanted to fuck every single part of his body. So badly. The blowjob, was kinda cheap, I expected higher prize to pay. After few moments I wanted more, more, more... Only fucking was the solution. This was very very hard to convince him. And I had to spice up the offer. Really... But once I saw his ashore, I knew it was worth every penny. Fucking him gently and hard, fast and slow. Yummy.
title: Czech Hunter 190
